definitions.definition: A nonmetallic chemical element ( symbol Ge) with an atomic number of 32: a lustrous , hard-brittle, grayish-white metalloid in the carbon group.

main_definition: A nonmetallic chemical element ( symbol Ge) with an atomic number of 32: a lustrous , hard-brittle, grayish-white metalloid in the carbon group.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An atom of this element.
